videos.description: UConn G Alterique Gilbert comes up with a steal then blows the open-court dunk.
videos.headline: Gilbert gets stuffed by rim on wide-open dunk

videos.description: Syracuse G Elijah Hughes jumps the passing lane and goes coast-to-coast for an and-1 bucket.
videos.headline: Hughes comes up with steal, finishes layup at other end

videos.description: Buddy Boeheim, son of Hall of Fame coach Jim, has his last name misspelled on his jersey.
videos.headline: Boeheim's name misspelled on jersey

videos.description: Tarin Smith gets into the lane and kicks it out to Eric Cobb for a 3-pointer to extend UConn's lead against Syracuse.
videos.headline: Cobb knocks down corner 3-pointer

videos.description: Jalen Adams swats a Syracuse layup attempt at one end then Bourama Sidibe rejects UConn at the other end but is called for a foul.
videos.headline: UConn, Syracuse exchange monster blocks

videos.description: UConn's Tarin Smith blocks a shot at one end then finishes a reverse layup in transition.
videos.headline: Smith floats for smooth reverse layup

videos.description: Elijah Hughes shows off the range as he pulls up from NBA range to cut into the UConn lead.
videos.headline: Cuse cuts into UConn lead with deep 3-pointer

videos.description: Alterique Gilbert and Jalen Adams knock down consecutive 3-pointers to put UConn up double digits on Syracuse.
videos.headline: Back-to-back deep 3s put Huskies up 10
